Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for me
Reviews.Author: Karen Monson
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera that I am just beginning to learn more about.  Bottom line it's an easy camera to point and shoot, takes fabulous clear pictures with excellent color.  I use the viewfinder with it since I don't like taking shots using the screen.  Pictures are extremely clear, and resolution is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad camera, but expensive for what it is.
Reviews.Author: Jensen A. Lau
Reviews.Content: This was a nice camera, but I don't think it was worth the price tag.  I felt any ISO above 1600 was extremely grainy.  I'm not really sure why the ISO goes above 6400 because the quality is pretty bad at 3200.

Reviews.Title: The Best Small Digital Camera Brings Professional Quality Shots
Reviews.Author: Yan Yang
Reviews.Content: This is the best small digital camera you can ever find. Huge improvement with the Aperture Ring and F1.4 Lens. Simply, it's Excellent!!!

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED FROM LEICA
Reviews.Author: gil barroso
Reviews.Content: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED.  THE 9 MEGAPIXEL BY MANUFACTURE REVIEW IS NOT COMPARABLE TO A 14 MEGAPIXELFOUND A LOT OF NOISE..
